name: part_003
file: tmp_【ハロウィンお披露目3D】#そらのハロウィンパーティー【全力で楽しんでいこう！】 [8aqY3tf4Zcg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora, Sakura Miko, AZKi, and Shirakami Fubuki perform a cover of 'Mrs. Pumpkin's Ridiculous Dream'.
scenes.song_name: Mrs. Pumpkinの滑稽な夢 (Mrs. Pumpkin's Ridiculous Dream)

scenes.description: The members gather on a floating platform in a Halloween-themed desert for an MC segment and game introduction.

subtitles.original: ダラダラダッタ　嫌気が何か企んで
subtitles.english: Dara dara datta... some kind of disgust is plotting something...

subtitles.original: 手を繋ぐ　お待つ
subtitles.english: Joining hands, the festival...

subtitles.original: 手を繋ごう　二つは許されない
subtitles.english: Let's join hands, two are not allowed.

subtitles.original: 鉄壁に　ツククク　ドの中
subtitles.english: Against an iron wall, tick-tock, inside the mud.

subtitles.original: 骨まで　マイカイ　ウラナリのこと
subtitles.english: To the bone, every time, things like late-harvest pumpkins.

subtitles.original: アハ　ツンで寝るお月様
subtitles.english: Aha, the tsundere moon is sleeping.

subtitles.original: あ、Mrs. Pumpkin　お迎えに上がりました
subtitles.english: Ah, Mrs. Pumpkin, I've come to pick you up.

subtitles.original: この夜はいつの間にか　夢を交わしたのだろう
subtitles.english: When did we exchange dreams on this night?

subtitles.original: まだここで踊っていたいのよ
subtitles.english: I still want to dance here.

subtitles.original: 夢のような　ラクラを
subtitles.english: Like a dream... this carousel.

subtitles.original: Mrs. Pumpkin
subtitles.english: Mrs. Pumpkin

subtitles.original: ほら吐き出した
subtitles.english: Look, it's been spat out.

subtitles.original: 買い無くと火が灯る
subtitles.english: The lights are lit in vain.

subtitles.original: ラッタッタ　Happy Day
subtitles.english: Latata, Happy Day

subtitles.original: ラルララルラ　私と踊ろうか
subtitles.english: Larula larula, shall we dance together?

subtitles.original: 変人なんか来るはずも　狂ったように
subtitles.english: No weirdos are supposed to come, like they're crazy...

subtitles.original: ほら　棺はどこにも無くなった
subtitles.english: Look, the coffin is nowhere to be found.

subtitles.original: つまらないや
subtitles.english: How boring.

subtitles.original: 沈み込んだ泥の中
subtitles.english: Sinking into the mud...

subtitles.original: 踊り待った夜の中
subtitles.english: Waiting and dancing in the night...

subtitles.original: 電車の中
subtitles.english: Inside the train.

subtitles.original: はい！というわけで、「Mrs. Pumpkinの滑稽な夢」でした！
subtitles.english: Yes! And so, that was 'Mrs. Pumpkin's Ridiculous Dream'!

subtitles.original: わーい！めっちゃ良かった！
subtitles.english: Yay! That was great!

subtitles.original: ね！今回はね、せっかくなので、ハロウィンって感じの曲を選ばせていただきましたよ！
subtitles.english: Right! Since it's a special occasion, we chose a song that feels like Halloween!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！THE曲ハロウィンだったよ！
subtitles.english: Yeah! It was the quintessential Halloween song!

subtitles.original: でもなんかあれ？何なのここは？
subtitles.english: But wait, what's with this place?

subtitles.original: ここは何だ？
subtitles.english: What is this place?

subtitles.original: いつの間にか来ていたが...
subtitles.english: We arrived here before I knew it...

subtitles.original: でもハロウィンっぽくない？ちょっと何かオレンジで...
subtitles.english: But doesn't it look like Halloween? It's kind of orange...

subtitles.original: オレンジだね！赤とかもね！
subtitles.english: It is orange! And red too!

subtitles.original: なんかハロウィンって感じの場所でしょう？
subtitles.english: It feels like a Halloween-y place, right?

subtitles.original: ちょっと...何か空中に浮いてるけど...
subtitles.english: Wait... we're kind of floating in mid-air though...

subtitles.original: いや、魔法の力。これは魔法の力よ！
subtitles.english: No, it's the power of magic. This is the power of magic!

subtitles.original: というわけでね、このパートでは早速...ゲームをやっていきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: So, in this part, we're going to... play a game right away!

subtitles.original: ゲーム！何やるの？
subtitles.english: A game! What are we playing?

subtitles.original: ま、ハロウィンといえばゲームだよね！
subtitles.english: Well, Halloween means games, right!

subtitles.original: そうだね！
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: みんなでね、楽しんでいこう！というわけで...
subtitles.english: Let's all have fun! So...

subtitles.original: 今日はね、ま、いろんなゲームするんだけど...
subtitles.english: Today, well, we're going to play various games...

subtitles.original: 総合で1位になった人にはちょっとご褒美も！ということで...
subtitles.english: And there will be a little reward for the overall winner! So...

subtitles.original: ご褒美があるの？
subtitles.english: There's a reward?

subtitles.original: そう！ちょっとやっていきたいなと思います。ぜひ見てね！
subtitles.english: Yes! I want to get started. Please watch!

subtitles.original: わーい！わーい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: はい！というわけで...やっぱ童心に戻りすぎたね？
subtitles.english: Right! So... we went back to being kids too much, didn't we?

subtitles.original: いや、いいんだよ。今日は祭りだから！
subtitles.english: No, it's fine. It's a festival today!

subtitles.original: 大丈夫か？
subtitles.english: Is it okay?

subtitles.original: 今日0期生もハロウィンで浮かれるって日でね！
subtitles.english: Today is a day for the 0th gen to get excited for Halloween!

subtitles.original: というわけで早速ゲームをやっていくんだけど...ちょっとね、待ってほしいんだよね。
subtitles.english: So we're going to start the game right away, but... I need you to wait a moment.

subtitles.original: いってらっしゃい！
subtitles.english: Go ahead!

subtitles.original: 何？何か準備が必要なこと？
subtitles.english: What? Something that needs preparation?

subtitles.original: あ！見て！世にも珍しい...
subtitles.english: Oh! Look! A very rare...

subtitles.original: あ！何ていう？みこあず...あずみこ！
subtitles.english: Oh! What do you call it? Miko-azu... Azu-miko!

subtitles.original: あずみこ！
subtitles.english: Azu-miko!

subtitles.original: どう？
subtitles.english: How is it?

subtitles.original: 可愛い！いいね、魔女っ子ね！魔女っ子！
subtitles.english: Cute! It's nice, the little witch look! Witch!

subtitles.original: 似合うでしょう？でもみこも悪魔だよ？デビルみこ！
subtitles.english: It suits us, doesn't it? But Miko is a devil too? Devil Miko!

subtitles.original: みこちのこのツノ可愛いで、ツノ！
subtitles.english: Miko-chi's horns here are cute, horns!

subtitles.original: 可愛い！ツノツノツノ...
subtitles.english: Cute! Horns, horns, horns...

subtitles.original: お！入るタイミングを見失ってるぞ！
subtitles.english: Oh! You're missing your cue to enter!

subtitles.original: ただいま！お待たせ！
subtitles.english: I'm back! Sorry to keep you waiting!

subtitles.original: お？え？や、ハロウィンといえばお祭りだよね！
subtitles.english: Oh? Eh? Well, Halloween means a festival, doesn't it!

subtitles.original: そらちゃん？今日はパーティで...
subtitles.english: Sora-chan? Today is a party...
